divs: Sighting DetailsI walked out of the front door of my apt. A local large bird flew over me and as it past, I saw the object moving at a high speed to the east. It made a 90% turn to the right and stopped. it made a wobbly motion in a circle then shot up slightly to the south and disappeared. I am a fromer private flyer and have met in person Major Marcel in 1978.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Basile
This sighting has never been favorited.
